language.item: There is already an newsletter account with the same E-Mail address registered.
For the stated E-mail address is no newsletter account registered.
While activating the newsletter account an error has occured.
The newsletter account has been successfully activated and may now be used.
While sending respectively saving the newsletter an error has occured.
The newsletter has been successfully sent.
This module is responsible for the newsletter.
The newsletter has been successfully saved.
The subject should be at least 3 characters long.
While creating your newsletter account an error has occured.

You have successfully subscribed to the newsletter on the website {host}. To complete the registration process, please click on the link below. If you've received this e-mail mistakenly, please ignore or delete this e-mail.
The newsletter account has been successfully created.
Will only be send to the E-mail adress which is stated in the newsletter settings.
The text should be at least 3 characters long.
While deleting the newsletter account an error has occured.
The newsletter account has been successfully deleted.
